<html><div style='background-color:'><P>OOC: I posted Azure's Message together with my reply, 'cause his message came directly to my mail<BR><BR>IC:</P>
<P>Lord Vykos was thoughtful for a moment, considering a possibility.<BR><BR>Vykos: Then we build a dummy Matrix, a beacon that will have all of <BR>the Devourer's minions zero in on the Maximal's damned base. They <BR>will not stop until they find out that they have been fooled. That <BR>will be when we strike and crush them all beneath our iron heels.<BR><BR>"Or better"replied Hydras"We can't took them and perhaps reprogram them to serve us... such soldiers are enough worthy... would be a pity destroy them"</P>
